entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Elliot Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:47 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Snow and local blowing snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 17. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
